text: Welcome to this charming, spacious residence nestled against the stunning backdrop of Littlefield's mountain range. Here's your quiet spot in the AZ Strip where you own your home and the land it sits on. That means no park rent and no guessing what's yours. It isn't fancy - and that's the beauty of it. It's solid, comfortable and ready for someone who wants their own slice of sunshine with a slower pace. Check out this pristine, unspoiled, 5-acre lot in beautiful Scenic, Arizona. Power is at the property line. Dig your own well or have water hauled in. Perfect for horses or the rustic side of ATV travels! Make an offer.

Over 125 acres of pristine desert winding along the Virgin River, with unobstructed views, abundant water, and endless potential. *Ideal location for RV Park*, plans already drawn - zoned Commercial Salvage. Can be rezoned to residential - buyer to verify. Backs to BLM land. The parcel includes a 2023-built residence with an attached garage, an RV garage with full hook-ups, three private wells, a fully lined pond, and new pivot irrigation. Cranes, herons, and chuckwallas roam the land. Multiple elevations offer cinematic mountain sunrises and panoramic vistas, an epic escape for developers or visionaries seeking scale, privacy, and story-rich terrain. A rare opportunity to create, cultivate, or conserve. Watch cows graze and cranes dance along the current, framed by sunrise over the mountains and sunsets that linger. So whether you envision a boutique retreat, an RV park, a family compound, or a legacy project that blends business and beauty, let's make it happen. Whether you seek solitude, sustainability, or a place to build something lasting for all to enjoy, this is where it begins. This property is not just about the home; it's about building your legacy.
